226766417918296064.Name: Mina Volare

Vigilante Legacy.Description:
Mina's past as a vigilante pit her against many struggles. She's hardened by the experience, but it was also a lonely existence.
She takes justice into her own hands and will not stop to bring down those who wronged her or others she cares about.

Too cool for her own good.Description:
Mina tries to be cool in any situation she faces.
Unfortunately, this can lead to her being overly confrontational or distant.

Tinfoil Hat.Description:
Mina is very wary of attempts to manipulate her due to her childhood.
This may lead to her being overly distrusting towards others, though she has been working on that.

Role: **The Smuggler**.Description:
Aspect: Ooh, Shiny

Stunts:

There's always a way: 
- As an action, can cross off to move self up to three zones, regardless of *physical* obstacles. 
- Cross off an additional box to bring a willing participant from the same zone, can stack. 
- Can be used to bring an unwilling particpant immediately after a successful overcome. (Note: you can roll against overcome actions if you wish to interfere.)
- Refresh at end of scene.
- May untick one box for a fate point.

To get what you need: 
- Once per session, may claim to have a useful object which is not extremely difficult to acquire.

A trusty tool & A useful souvenir.Description: I get +2 to Overcome with Sneaky when dealing with specifically watchful eyes or locks.

Dramatic Exit.Description: I get +2 to a roll if I declare it my last for the conflict. I may no longer initiate rolls afterwards if successful, only perform defensive rolls.

Trouble: Searching for a place to belong.
